conbody.p: Whenever you hover the mouse over each pod a pop-up menu is displayed that allows you to perform the following actions on the specific pod, as shown in the figure.

ul.li: Toggle Axis Labels—Allows you to toggle the items displayed on the X and Y axis.
Toggle Data Labels—Allows you to display values on the Y axis on the pie chart.

li.p: Toggle 3D View of the chart—Allows you to switch between the three dimensional and two dimensional views of the charts.
Print pod using the browser's print option, printing to a local printer.
Export pod to JPEG, PNG, or PDF formats.
Toggle the grid on and off to gain a larger view of the chart.
Toggle the chart on and off to gain a larger view of the grid.
